nsr-entry.authors: G.Bellini, for the Borexino Collaboration
nsr-entry.title: New experimental limits on the Pauli-forbidden transitions in {+12}C nuclei obtained with 485 days Borexino data
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+12}C(|b{++}),(|b{+-}),(n),(p),(IT); measured |g, particle spectra, limits of half-lives for Pauli-forbidden transitions using Borexino detector. Comparison with previous measurements. Test of Pauli exclusion principle for nucleons in {+12}C through search for |g, neutron, proton, |b{+-} or |b{++} emission in Pauli-forbidden transition from 1p{-3/2}-shell nucleons to the filled 1s{-1/2} shell in nuclei.

nsr-entry.title: |b decay of nuclei around {+90}Se: Search for signatures of a N=56 subshell closure relevant to the r process
nsr-entry.keywords: NUCLEAR REACTIONS {+9}Be({+136}Xe,X){+86}As/{+87}As/{+88}As/{+88}Se/{+89}Se/{+90}Se/{+90}Br/{+91}Br/{+92}Br/{+93}Br/{+91}Kr/{+92}Kr/{+93}Kr/{+94}Kr/{+95}Kr/{+93}Rb/{+94}Rb/{+95}Rb/{+96}Rb/{+97}Rb/{+95}Sr/{+96}Sr/{+97}Sr/{+98}Sr/{+99}Sr/{+97}Y/{+98}Y/{+99}Y/{+100}Y/{+101}Y/{+100}Zr/{+101}Zr/{+102}Zr/{+103}Zr,E=120 MeV/nucleon; measured fragment spectra by energy loss and time-of-flight, total kinetic energies (TKE) of {+97},{+98},{+99}Sr fragments in 36{++}, 37{++}, 38{++} charge states, half-lives by fragment-|b correlations. Beta Counting System (BCS) at NSCL.

RADIOACTIVITY {+87},{+88}As,{+88},{+89},{+90}Se,{+90},{+91},{+92},{+93}Br,{+93},{+94},{+95}Kr,{+95},{+96},{+97}Rb,{+96},{+97},{+98},{+99}Sr,{+99},{+100},{+101}Y(|b{+-})[from {+9}Be({+136}Xe,X),E=120 MeV/nucleon]; measured E|b, E|g, (fragment)|b correlations, half-lives. Beta Counting System (BCS) at NSCL and SEGA array. Maximum likelihood and least-squares analyses for half-lives. Comparison of measured half-lives with QRPA calculations used in r process, and with previous measurements. Role of g{-9/2} proton and h{-11/2} neutron intruders. No evidence of N=56 subshell closure in {+90}Se. Relevance to r-process nuclei.

nsr-entry.authors: A.Etile, D.Verney, N.N.Arsenyev, J.Bettane, I.N.Borzov, M.C.Mhamed, P.V.Cuong, C.Delafosse, F.Didierjean, C.Gaulard, Nguyen Van Giai, A.Goasduff, F.Ibrahim, K.Kolos, C.Lau, M.Niikura, S.Roccia, A.P.Severyukhin, D.Testov, S.Tusseau-Nenez, V.V.Voronov
nsr-entry.title: Low-lying intruder and tensor-driven structures in {+82}As revealed by |b decay at a new movable-tape-based experimental setup
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+82}Ge(|b{+-})[from {+238}U(e,F),E=50 MeV followed by online mass separation using PARRNe mass separator at ALTO ISOL facility of IPN-Orsay]; measured E|g, I|g, |b|g-, |g|g-coin, half-life of {+82}Ge isotope using BEDO detector assembly. {+82}As; deduced levels, J, three potential 1+ states, |p, |b feedings, logft. Comparison with experimental and theoretical values of two 1+ states in {+82}As and {+80}Ga. Comparison with empirical core-particle coupling model and fully microscopic treatment within Skyrme-QRPA (quasiparticle random-phase approximation) approach. Discussed Gamow-Teller fragmentation due to tensor correlations and couplings to 2p-2h excitations. {+82}Ga(|b{+-}); measured half-life from growth-decay curve for 1348-keV |g ray, and compared with earlier experimental value. {+81},{+82},{+82m}As,{+81},{+81m}Ge,{+82}Ga,{+130},{+132}Sb,{+132}Sn(|b{+-}),{+82}Ga(|b{+-}n); observed |g rays from fission fragments present in the sample.

NUCLEAR STRUCTURE {+81}Ga,{+83}As,{+85}Br,{+87}Rb; calculated proton QP energies, occupation probabilities. {+80}Ga,{+82}As,{+84}Br,{+86}Rb; calculated unperturbed energies of neutron-proton 2-qp states. {+81}Ge,{+82},{+83}As,{+85}Kr,{+86},{+87}Rb; calculated levels, J, |p. {+80}Ga,{+82}As; calculated energies and structures of the QRPA dipole (1+) neutron-proton 2-qp states. Comparison with experimental data. Empirical core-particle coupling model and fully microscopic treatment within Skyrme-QRPA approach.

nsr-entry.title: |b-decay study of {+94}Kr
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+94}Kr(|b{+-})[from UC{-x}(p,F),E=50 MeV, mass separation at HRIFB-ORNL]; measured E|g, I|g, half-life of {+94}Kr decay, |g|g-, |b|g-, delayed |b|g-, and |b|g|g-coin, isomer half-life by |b|g(t) at LeRIBSS with four HPGe clover detectors for |g rays and two plastic scintillators for |b detection. {+94}Rb; deduced levels, J, |p, |b feedings, logft, configurations. nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+177}Lu(|b{+-})[from {+176}Yb(n,|g)]; measured E|g,I|g using HPGe spectrometer; deduced |s, T{-1/2}, evaluated uncertainty. Compared with published data.

nsr-entry.authors: A.B.Garnsworthy, M.Bowry, B.Olaizola, J.D.Holt, S.R.Stroberg, S.Cruz, S.Georges, G.Hackman, A.D.MacLean, J.Measures, H.P.Patel, C.J.Pearson, C.E.Svensson
nsr-entry.title: Spectroscopy of {+50}Sc and ab initio calculations of B(M3) strengths
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+50}Ca(|b{+-})[from Ta(p,X),E=500 MeV at TRIUMF-ISAC facility]; measured E|g, I|g, |g|g-coin, |g|g(|q), level half-lives by |g|g(t) using GRIFFIN array of clover HPGe detectors, LaBr{-3}(Ce) scintillators for fast timing, and plastic scintillator array SCEPTAR for |b particles. {+50}Sc; deduced levels, J, |p, |g-ray branching ratios, B(M3), B(M1), B(E2), mixing ratio, single-particle-orbital occupation numbers. Comparison with theoretical transition strengths from standard operators and from wave functions produced with the KB3G-pf shell interaction and the valence-space in-medium similarity renormalization group (VS-IMSRG). Comparison of experimental and theoretical B(M3) for transitions in {+24}Na, {+24}Al, {+34},{+38}Cl, {+38}K and {+50}Sc, the theoretical values from ab initio calculations using the VS-IMSRG approach with consistently derived effective Hamiltonians and effective M3 operator.

nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+106}Nb,{+110}Zr(|b{+-}); {+108},{+110},{+110m}Nb(|b{+-}),(|b{+-}n)[from {+9}Be({+238}U,F),E=345 MeV/nucleon followed by separation of fragments using BigRIPS separator at RIBF-RIKEN facility, {+110}Nb also from {+110}Zr decay]; measured E|g, I|g, |g|g-coin, E|b, I|b, |b-ion correlations, (ion)|b|g-coin, half-lives of decays of {+106},{+108},{+110},{+110m}Nb decays, half-lives of the first 2+ states by |b|g(t) in {+106},{+118},{+110}Mo using WAS3ABi set up, EURICA and LaBr{-3}(Ce) arrays at RIKEN. {+106},{+108},{+110}Mo; deduced levels, J, |p, isomer in {+110}Nb, beta feedings, logft, %|b{+-}n or P{-n} from decays of {+108},{+110},{+110m}Nb, B(E2). Comparison with previous experimental results, and with model calculations.

nsr-entry.authors: Y.Hirayama, Y.X.Watanabe, M.Mukai, M.Ahmed, S.C.Jeong, Y.Kakiguchi, S.Kimura, M.Oyaizu, J.H.Park, P.Schury, M.Wada, H.Watanabe, H.Miyatake
nsr-entry.title: |b- and |g-decay spectroscopy of {+197,198}Os
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+196},{+197},{+198}Os,{+198}Ir(|b{+-})[from {+198}Pt({+136}Xe,X),E=10.75 MeV/nucleon using KEK Isotope Separation System (KISS) at RIKEN, an argon-gas-cell-based laser ion source combined with an on-line isotope separator]; measured |b{+-} radiation using multisegmented proportional gas counter (MSPGC), E|g, I|g, |g|g- and |b|g-coin with particle selection condition of Os and Ir, half-lives of decays of {+196},{+197},{+198}Os and {+198}Ir. {+197},{+198}Ir,{+198}Pt; deduced levels, I|b feedings, logft, configurations of parent and daughter states. {+197m}Tl(IT); measured E|g, I|g, T{-1/2}; deduced conversion coefficients and compared with previous results. Comparison with previous experimental data. A=195-206,Z=76; comparison of measured |b-decay half-lives with theoretical results from DF3, FRDM, and KUTY models.

nsr-entry.authors: M.Hughes, E.A.George, O.Naviliat-Cuncic, P.A.Voytas, S.Chandavar, A.Gade, X.Huyan, S.N.Liddick, K.Minamisono, S.V.Paulauskas, D.Weisshaar
nsr-entry.title: Measurement of the {+20}F half-life
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+20}F(|b{+-})[from {+9}Be({+22}Ne,X),E=150 MeV/nucleon followed by fragment analysis using A1900 fragment separator at NSCL-MSU]; measured |g radiation, |b{+-}|g-coin, half-life of {+20}F decay using four CsI(Na) detectors from the CAESAR array. Comparison with previous nine experimental values, and pointed out need for a new measurement using a method with different sources of systematic uncertainties, in order to resolve discrepancies in current data.

nsr-entry.authors: J.Kurpeta, A.Plochocki, W.Urban, T.Eronen, A.Jokinen, A.Kankainen, V.S.Kolhinen, I.D.Moore, H.Penttila, M.Pomorski, S.Rinta-Antila, T.Rzaca-Urban, J.Wisniewski
nsr-entry.title: Excited levels in the multishaped {+117}Pd nucleus studied via |b decay of {+117}Rh
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+117}Rh(|b{+-})[from {+238}U(p,F),E=25 MeV followed by separation of {+117}Rh using IGISOL-4 mass separator coupled to the JYFLTRAP Penning trap at Jyvaskyla]; measured E|g, I|g, Pd x-rays, |b|g-, (x-ray)|g- and |g|g-coin, half-life of {+117}Rh decay from |g-decay curves using plastic scintillator for |b detection and Ge detectors for |g detection. {+117}Pd; deduced levels, J, |p, |b feedings, logft values, configurations, Gamow-Teller transition strengths. {+117}Rh; deduced preliminary J and |p of ground state from theoretical calculations and systematics of Rh isotopes. Systematics of low-spin levels in odd A=101-119 Rh isotopes and odd A=103-117 Pd isotopes, isomeric states and |g transitions in odd A=105-117 Pd isotopes, and negative-parity levels in odd A, N=57-71 Mo, Ru, and Pd isotopes.

nsr-entry.authors: R.Lica, for the IDS Collaboration
nsr-entry.title: Evolution of deformation in neutron-rich Ba isotopes up to A=150
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+148},{+150}Cs(|b{+-}),(|b{+-}n)[from U(p,X),E=1.4 GeV using General Purpose Separator (GPS) at ISOLDE-CERN]; measured E|g, I|g, E|b, |g|g- and |b|g-coin, half-lives of the decays of {+148},{+150}Cs, half-lives of first 2+ states in {+148},{+150}Ba by fast-timing technique using four HPGe detectors, three LaBr{-3}(Ce) detectors for fast-timing and three plastic scintillators for |b particle detection. {+148},{+150}Ba; deduced levels, J, |p, B(E2), deformations, |b feedings, logft. {+148}Cs; deduced %|b{+-}n for its decay. Comparison with previous experimental data, and with symmetry conserving configuration mixing (SCCM) calculations. Level systematics in neighboring nuclides.

NUCLEAR STRUCTURE {+142},{+144},{+146},{+148},{+150}Ba; calculated potential energy surfaces in (|b{-2},|b{-3}) plane; deduced evolution of quadrupoledeformed shapes with a definite octupolar character. Symmetry conserving configuration mixing (SCCM) calculations. Comparison with experimental data.

nsr-entry.authors: Q.McKnight, S.D.Bergeson, J.Peatross, M.J.Ware
nsr-entry.title: 2.7 years of beta-decay-rate ratio measurements in a controlled environment
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+22}Na(|b{++}),{+36}Cl(|b{++}),(|b{+-}),{+60}Co,{+90}Sr,{+137}Cs(|b{+-}); measured decay products, I|g; deduced lack of variation in decay constants over the years.

nsr-entry.title: Measurement of the neutron lifetime using a magneto-gravitational trap and in situ detection
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+1}NN(|b{+-}); measured T{-1/2} of free neutron using ultracold neutrons stored in a magneto-gravitational trap at the Los Alamos Neutron Science Center UCN facility. Comparison with previous measurements.

nsr-entry.authors: T.Rzaca-Urban, W.Urban, M.Czerwinski, J.Wisniewski, A.Blanc, H.Faust, M.Jentschel, P.Mutti, U.Koster, T.Soldner, G.de France, G.S.Simpson, C.A.Ur
nsr-entry.title: Low-spin excitations in {+97}Zr
nsr-entry.keywords: NUCLEAR REACTIONS {+96}Zr(n,|g),E=cold or thermal; measured E|g, I|g, |g|g-coin, |g|g(|q) using the EXILL HPGe array at the PF1B cold-neutron facility of ILL, Grenoble. {+97}Zr; deduced levels, J, |p, multipolarities, mixing ratios, S(n), configurations. Comparison with previous experimental values. {+27}Al,{+35}Cl,{+91}Zr(n,|g),E=cold or thermal; measured E|g, I|g, data used for calibration purpose. {+28}Al,{+92},{+97}Zr; deduced S(n) and compared with literature values.

RADIOACTIVITY {+97},{+97m}Y(|b{+-})[from {+235}U(n,F) using Lohengrin fission-fragment separator of the ILL]; measured E|g, I|g, |g|g-coin, |g|g(|q), |g|g(linear polarization) using the EXILL Ge array. {+97}Zr; deduced levels, J, |p, multipolarities, mixing ratios. {+97}Sr,{+88}Br(IT); measured isomer half-lives of 830-keV isomer in {+97}Sr, and 270-keV isomer in {+88}Br by |g(t).

nsr-entry.authors: A.P.Serebrov, E.A.Kolomensky, A.K.Fomin, I.A.Krasnoshchekova, A.V.Vassiljev, D.M.Prudnikov, I.V.Shoka, A.V.Chechkin, M.E.Chaikovskiy, V.E.Varlamov, S.N.Ivanov, A.N.Pirozhkov, P.Geltenbort, O.Zimmer, T.Jenke, M.Van der Grinten, M.Tucker
nsr-entry.title: Neutron lifetime measurements with a large gravitational trap for ultracold neutrons
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+1}n(|b{+-}); measured I|b, T{-1/2} of free neutron, storage cycles for two different holding times, temperature dependence of the UCN storage time, inverse UCN loss rate, neutron count rates before (reactor cycle 179) and after (reactor cycle 181) using gravitationally trapped ultra-cold neutrons (UCN) at Institute Laue-Langevin (ILL) using the PF2 MAM UCN beam; deduced trap-neutron collision frequency, systematic error in T{-1/2} measurements using Monte Carlo simulations, influence of the residual gas on UCN storage. Comparison with previous experimental values in the last 17 years, and with evaluations by Particle Data Group. Discussed problem of a 3.9|s discrepancy between measurements of half-life of free neutron using neutrons in beams and those with stored ultracold neutrons (UCN).

nsr-entry.authors: K.Siegl, N.D.Scielzo, A.Czeszumska, J.A.Clark, G.Savard, A.Aprahamian, S.A.Caldwell, B.S.Alan, M.T.Burkey, C.J.Chiara, J.P.Greene, J.Harker, S.T.Marley, G.E.Morgan, J.M.Munson, E.B.Norman, R.Orford, S.Padgett, A.Perez Galvan, K.S.Sharma, S.Y.Strauss
nsr-entry.title: Recoil ions from the |b decay of {+134}Sb confined in a Paul trap
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+134},{+134m}Sb(|b{+-})[from {+252}Cf SF decay at CARIBU-ANL facility]; measured |b, |g, singly-charged recoil ions, |b|g-coin, |b(ce)-coin, (recoils)|b-coin, time-of-flight spectra for |b(ion)-coin using Beta-decay Paul Trap (BPT); deduced charge-state distribution of the recoiling ions, mean electron loss, |b-|n correlation coefficient (a{-|b|n}), |b-decay simulations, significant |b-decay strength (17.2%) to high-lying excited states in {+134}Te to obtain an angular correlation consistent with expected value of unity for 0- to 0+ |b transition. Comparison of the observed |b-decay spectrum with that from the decay scheme in the ENSDF database or Nuclear Data Sheets for {+134}Sb g.s. decay. Comparison of mean atomic electron loss in {+134}Sb decay with that from the decays of noble gases {+6}He, {+23}Ne, {+35}Ar, {+41}Ar, {+85}Kr and {+133}Xe. {+134},{+134m}Sb; half-lives used from literature and those determined at CARIBU-ANL facility (reference 23 in this work).

nsr-entry.authors: K.Siegl, K.Kolos, N.D.Scielzo, A.Aprahamian, G.Savard, M.T.Burkey, M.P.Carpenter, P.Chowdhury, J.A.Clark, P.Copp, G.J.Lane, C.J.Lister, S.T.Marley, E.A.McCutchan, A.J.Mitchell, J.Rohrer, M.L.Smith, S.Zhu
nsr-entry.title: |B-decay half-lives of {+134,134m}Sb and their isomeric yield ratio produced by the spontaneous fission of {+252}Cf
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+134m},{+134}Sb(|b{+-})[from {+252}Cf(SF), mass separated high-intensity beams]; measured E|b, I|b, E|g, I|g, |b|g-coin, half-lives of decays of {+134}Sb and {+134m}Sb, and isomeric yield ratios from {+252}Cf(SF) using the Scintillator And Tape Using Radioactive Nuclei (SATURN) system for |b{+-} detection, and X-Array for |g detection at the CARIBU facility of ANL. Systematics of isomeric yield ratios of {+128},{+130},{+134}Sb,{+131},{+133}Te,{+132},{+134},{+136}I,{+135}Xe,{+138}Cs from {+252}Cf(SF). Comparison with previous experimental values.

nsr-entry.authors: M.Stryjczyk, Y.Tsunoda, I.G.Darby, H.De Witte, J.Diriken, D.V.Fedorov, V.N.Fedosseev, L.M.Fraile, M.Huyse, U.Koster, B.A.Marsh, T.Otsuka, D.Pauwels, L.Popescu, D.Radulov, M.D.Seliverstov, A.M.Sjodin, P.Van den Bergh, P.Van Duppen, M.Venhart, W.B.Walters, K.Wimmer
nsr-entry.title: |b{+-}decay study of the {+66}Mn - {+66}Fe - {+66}Co - {+66}Ni decay chain
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+66}Mn(|b{+-}),(|b{+-}n)[from U(p,F), Mn beam purified by laser resonance ionization and mass separation]; {+66}Fe(|b{+-})[from {+66}Mn |b{+-} decay]; {+66}Co(|b{+-})[from {+66}Fe |b{+-} decay]; measured E|b, I|b, E|g, I|g, half-lives of |b-decaying {+66}Mn,{+66}Fe,{+66}Co, |g|g- and |b|g|g-coin, half-lives of isomers in {+65}Fe, {+66}Co by |g(t) using plastic scintillators for |b detection and MiniBall cluster Ge detectors for |g detection at ISOLDE-CERN. {+65},{+66}Fe,{+66}Co,{+66}Ni; deduced levels, isomers, J, |p, |b feedings, logft, B(GT) values, %|b{+-}n value for the decay of {+66}Mn. Comparison with Monte Carlo shell model calculations.

NUCLEAR STRUCTURE {+66}Mn,{+66}Fe,{+66}Co,{+66}Ni; calculated average proton and neutron occupation numbers for selected low-lying positive-parity states, potential energy surface (PES) in (Q{-0},Q{-2}) plane, levels, J, |p, B(M1), B(E2) using Monte Carlo Shell model with the A3DA interactions. Comparison with experimental data.

nsr-entry.authors: B.Abromeit, V.Tripathi, H.L.Crawford, S.N.Liddick, S.Yoshida, Y.Utsuno, P.C.Bender, B.P.Crider, R.Dungan, P.Fallon, K.Kravvaris, N.Larson, R.S.Lubna, T.Otsuka, C.J.Prokop, A.L.Richard, N.Shimizu, S.L.Tabor, A.Volya
nsr-entry.title: |B{+-} decay of T{-z} = +11/2 isotopes {+37}Al and {+39}Si: Understanding Gamow-Teller strength distribution in neutron-rich nuclei
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+37}Al,{+37},{+39},{+40}Si,{+37},{+39}P(|b{+-})[from {+9}Be({+48}Ca,X),E=140 MeV/nucleon, followed by fragment separation using A1900 separator at NSCL-MSU]; {+37}Al,{+39}Si(|b{+-}n); measured |b, E|g, I|g, |b|g-coin, half-lives of decays of {+37}Al, {+37}Si and {+39}Si, %|b{+-}n for decays of {+37}Al and {+39}Si using |b-counting system (BCS) at NSCL-MSU which consisted of silicon PIN detectors, segmented planar Ge double-sided strip detector (GeDSSD) for implants and |b{+-} detection, and an array of 16 segmented Ge detectors for |g rays. {+36}Si,{+37}Si,{+37},{+39},{+40}P,{+37},{+39}S; deduced levels, J, |p, |b feedings, logft, %|b{+-}n. Systematics of low-lying positive |p states in {+35},{+37},{+39}P, and T{-1/2} in N=20-28 Si isotopes. Comparison with shell model calculations.

NUCLEAR STRUCTURE {+35},{+37},{+39}P,{+37},{+39}S,{+37}Si; calculated levels, J, |p, logft values. Shell model calculations using the SDPFSDG-MU interaction. Comparison with experimental data from the present experiment, and the evaluated data in the ENSDF database at NNDC.

nsr-entry.authors: S.S.Alam, T.Bhattacharjee, D.Banerjee, A.Saha, S.Das, M.S.Sarkar, S.Sarkar
nsr-entry.title: Lifetimes and transition probabilities for the low-lying states in {+131}I and {+132}Xe
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+131m}Te[from {+238}U(|a,F),E=40 MeV]; {+132}I(|b{+-})[from decay of {+132}Te formed in {+238}U(|a,F),E=40 MeV]; measured E|g, I|g, |g|g-coin, level half-lives by |g|g(t) fast-timing method, and half-life of 1797-keV nanosecond isomer in {+131}I by slope method using the VENTURE array of CeBr{-3} scintillators and VENUS arrays of six Compton-suppressed Clover HPGe detectors at the K-130 cyclotron facility of VECC, Kolkata. {+131}I,{+132}Xe; deduced levels, J, |p, configurations, B(E1), B(E2), B(E3). Systematics of E1 decays from 11/2- levels in {+121},{+123},{+125},{+127},{+131}I, and 13/2- and 15/2- levels in {+129}Sb,{+131},{+133}I. Comparison with large-basis shell model calculations using the NUSHELLX code.

NUCLEAR STRUCTURE {+131}I,{+132}Xe; calculated levels, J, |p, dominant particle partitions, configurations, and level half-lives using the large-basis shell model (LBSM) with the NUSHELLX code. Comparison with experimental data.

nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+127}Te,{+127}Sb(|b{+-})[from U(|g,F),E=bremsstrahlung radiation from 26 MeV electron beam]; measured E|g, I|g, half-life and contaminants using HPGe detector at Idaho National Laboratory's Materials and Fuels Complex. Comparison with data from NNDC databases. Discussed relevance to forensic analysis of fallout debris from hypothetical nuclear event. {+99m}Tc,{+115m}In(IT); {+103}Ru,{+105}Rh,{+111},{+112}Ag,{+115m}In,{+125}Sn,{+126}Sb,{+131},{+132},{+133}I,{+132}Te(|b{+-}); observed |g rays.

nsr-entry.authors: A.C.Dombos, A.Spyrou, F.Naqvi, S.J.Quinn, S.N.Liddick, A.Algora, T.Baumann, J.Brett, B.P.Crider, P.A.DeYoung, T.Ginter, J.Gombas, E.Kwan, S.Lyons, W.-J.Ong, A.Palmisano, J.Pereira, C.J.Prokop, D.P.Scriven, A.Simon, M.K.Smith, C.S.Sumithrarachchi
nsr-entry.title: |b-decay half-lives of neutron-rich nuclides in the A=100--110 mass region
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+99}Y,{+101},{+102}Zr,{+102m},{+103},{+104m}Nb,{+109}Tc(|b{+-})[from {+9}Be({+124}Sn,X),E=120 MeV/nucleon, followed by separation of reaction products using A1900 fragment separator]; measured (implants)|g-coin, time-of-flight, total energy loss of fragments, and half-lives from (implants)|g-correlated decay curves using the implantation station installed inside the Summing NaI(Tl) (SuN) detector for the total absorption spectroscopy (TAS) technique at the NSCL-MSU facility. Comparison with previous experimental values; compiled measured and evaluated half-lives in literature for the seven isotopes studied in this work. Relevance to B(GT) distributions, nuclear astrophysics, nuclear structure, and nuclear technology.

nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+131}In(|b{+-}),(|b{+-}n)[from U(p,F),E=480 MeV]; measured E|g, I|g, I|b{+-}, |g|g-, |b|g-, and |b|g|g-coin, half-lives of 9/2+ ground state, 1/2- and 21/2+ isomers in {+131}In, and those of 10+ isomer in {+130}Sn, and (23/2-) isomer in {+131}Sn using the GRIFFIN array for |g detection and the SCEPTAR array for |b detection at TRIUMF-ISAC facility. {+130},{+131}Sn,{+130}Sb; deduced levels, J, |p, conversion coefficient, multipolarity, configurations, |b feedings, delayed-neutron emission probabilities P{-n} for 21/2+ isomer, and combined P{-n} for 1/2- isomer and 9/2+ g.s. for the decays of {+131}In activities. nsr-entry.title: Neutron capture cross sections of {+108,110}Pd
nsr-entry.keywords: NUCLEAR REACTIONS {+108},{+110}Pd(n,|g){+109}Pd/{+109m}Pd/{+111}Pd/{+111m}Pd,measured E|g, I|g, thermal capture |s and resonance integrals, isomer ratios using Ge detector for |g detection at Oregon State TRIGA reactor. Comparison with previous experimental values.
RADIOACTIVITY {+109},{+111},{+111m}Pd(|b{+-}),{+109m}Pd(IT)[from {+108},{+110}Pd(n,|g),E=thermal]; measured E|g, T{-1/2}. Comparison with previous experimental values.

nsr-entry.authors: K.S.Krane
nsr-entry.title: Neutron capture cross sections of {+178}Hf leading to {+179}Hf{+m2}
nsr-entry.keywords: NUCLEAR REACTIONS {+178}Hf(n,|g){+179m}Hf,E=epithermal; measured E|g, I|g, |s, resonance integral, half-life of {+179m}Hf decay using HPGe detector for |g detection using TRIGA reactor at Oregon State University. Systematics of neutron capture |s for {+92}Mo,{+177}Hf,{+178}Hf,{+189}Os targets leading to high-spin states in product nuclei. Comparison with previous experimental results.

RADIOACTIVITY {+179m}Hf(IT)[from {+178}Hf(n,|g),E=epithermal]; measured E|g, I|g, half-life of {+179m}Hf decay. {+179}Hf; deduced high-spin levels, J, |p. {+181}Hf(|b{+-})[from {+180}Hf(n,|g),E=thermal]; {+175}Hf(EC)[from {+174}Hf(n,|g),E=thermal]; measured E|g, I|g. {+175}Lu,{+181}Ta; deduced levels. Comparison with evaluated data in the ENSDF database, and with previous experimental results.

nsr-entry.authors: Krishichayan, M.Bhike, C.R.Howell, A.P.Tonchev, W.Tornow
nsr-entry.title: Fission product yield measurements using monoenergetic photon beams
nsr-entry.keywords: NUCLEAR REACTIONS {+235},{+238}U,{+239}Pu(polarized |g,F){+84}Br/{+85m}Kr/{+87}Kr/{+88}Kr/{+91}Sr/{+92}Sr/{+92}Y/{+93}Y/{+94}Y/{+95}Zr/{+97}Zr/{+99}Mo/{+103}Ru/{+104}Tc/{+105}Ru/{+105}Rh/{+115}Cd/{+127}Sb/{+128}Sn/{+129}Sb/{+130}Sb/{+131}Sb/{+131}I/{+132}Te/{+132}Cs/{+133}Te/{+133}I/{+134}Te/{+135}I/{+136}Cs/{+138}Cs/{+139}Ba/{+140}Ba/{+141}Ba/{+141}Ce/{+142}La/{+143}Ce/{+146}Pr/{+147}Nd/{+149}Nd/{+151}Pm,E=13 MeV; measured fission fragments, E|g, I|g, fission product yields (FPY) using dual fission chamber for fission fragments and offline |g detection at TUNL-HI|gS facility. Comparison with previous experimental neutron- and photon-induced fission product yields.

RADIOACTIVITY {+91},{+92}Sr,{+142}La(|b{+-})[from {+235},{+238}U,{+239}Pu(polarized |g,F),E=13 MeV at TUNL-HI|gS facility]; measured half-lives of decay of {+91}Sr, {+92}Sr, and {+142}La, and compared with values from ENSDF database at NNDC.

nsr-entry.authors: K.S.Krane
nsr-entry.title: Neutron capture cross sections of {+93}Nb
nsr-entry.keywords: NUCLEAR REACTIONS {+93}Nb(n,|g){+94}Nb/{+94m}Nb,E=thermal and epithermal neutrons from Oregon State University TRIGA reactor; measured E|g, I|g; deduced thermal radiative cross sections and resonance integrals. Comparison with previous measurements.

RADIOACTIVITY {+92m}Nb(|b{+-})[from {+93}Nb(n,2n),E=reactor neutrons]; {+94},{+94m}Nb [from {+93}Nb(n,|g),E=thermal and epithermal]; measured E|g, I|g, half-life of {+92m}Nb decay. {+92}Zr,{+94}Mo; deduced levels. Comparison with previous experimental results.

nsr-entry.authors: J.Kurpeta, A.Plochocki, W.Urban, A.Abramuk, L.Canete, T.Eronen, A.Fijalkowska, S.Geldhof, K.Gotowicka, A.Jokinen, A.Kankainen, I.D.Moore, D.Nesterenko, H.Penttila, I.Pohjalainen, M.Pomorski, M.Reponen, S.Rinta-Antila, A.de Roubin, T.Rzaca-Urban, M.Vilen, J.Wisniewski
nsr-entry.title: First |b-decay scheme of {+107}Nb: New insight into the low-energy levels of {+107}Mo
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+107}Nb(|b{+-})[from U(p,F),E=25 MeV from the K-130 cyclotron at the University of Jyvaskyla, followed by separation of fission fragments using IGISOL-4 for mass separation, and JYFLTRAP Penning trap for isobaric purification]; measured yields of Mo and Nb ions, E|g, I|g, |g|g- and |b|g-coin, |g(K|a x-ray)-coin, half-life of the decay of {+107}Nb using a plastic scintillator for |b particles and three Ge detectors for low-energy |g rays. {+107}Mo; deduced levels, J, |p, bands, K-conversion coefficients for three transitions, total conversion coefficient for one transition, multipolarities, |b feedings, logft. Systematics of energies of the first and second 1/2+ levels in N=55-71, Z(even)=40-46. Comparison of the experimental |g-ray transition intensities between low-lying levels in {+105}Mo and {+107}Mo. Discussed the revised energy of the 420-ns isomer.

nsr-entry.authors: M.Laubenstein, B.Lehnert, S.S.Nagorny, S.Nisi, K.Zuber
nsr-entry.title: New investigation of half-lives for the decay modes of {+50}V
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+50}V(EC),(|b{+-}); measured E|g, I|g, T{-1/2} using ultralow background HPGe detectors at the Gran Sasso Underground Laboratory (LNGS). Comparison with previous experimental values.

nsr-entry.authors: R.Lewis, S.N.Liddick, A.C.Larsen, A.Spyrou, D.L.Bleuel, A.Couture, L.Crespo Campo, B.P.Crider, A.C.Dombos, M.Guttormsen, S.Mosby, F.Naqvi, G.Perdikakis, C.J.Prokop, S.J.Quinn, T.Renstrom, S.Siem
nsr-entry.title: Experimental constraints on the {+73}Zn(n,|g){+74}Zn reaction rate
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+74}Cu(|b{+-})[{+74}Cu ions from Be({+86}Kr,X),E=140 MeV/nucleon reaction and using A1900 separator at NSCL-MSU facility]; measured |b particles, E|g, I|g, |b|g-coin, half-life of {+74}Cu decay using the Summing NaI detector for total absorption spectroscopy (TAS); deduced nuclear level density (NLD), and |g strength function (|gSF) using the |b-Oslo method, distribution of spins for levels in {+74}Zn around S(n). Comparison with previous experimental results, and with theoretical calculations using TALYS code. Results used to deduce |s for {+73}Zn(n,|g) reaction.

NUCLEAR REACTIONS {+73}Zn(n,|g),E=0.01-1 MeV; deduced |s(E), and astrophysical reaction rates using the experimental NLD and |gSF. Comparison with Hauser-Feshbach statistical model calculations using TALYS code.

nsr-entry.authors: R.Lica, for the IDS Collaboration
nsr-entry.title: Normal and intruder configurations in {+34}Si populated in the |b{+-} decay of {+34}Mg and {+34}Al
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+34}Mg,{+34},{+34m}Al(|b{+-}),(|b{+-}n)[from U(p,X),E=1 GeV pulsed beam from ISOLDE-CERN, followed by selective ionization using the RILIS technique, and A=34 separation using the ISOLDE General Purpose Separator]; measured E|g, I|g, E|b, |b|g-, |g|g- and |b|g|g-coin, half-lives of decays of {+34}Al and {+34m}Al, half-life of excited 0+ state in {+34}Si by |b(E0)(t), deduced %|b{+-}n or P{-n}. {+34}Si; deduced levels, J, |p, |b feedings, logft, B(E2), configurations, intruder configurations, absence of triaxial deformation in {+34}Si. Discussed Mixing between the first and second 0+ states in {+34}Si. Comparison with large scale shell-model calculations using the SDPF-U-MIX interaction. Systematics of energies of 4- and 5- states in N=20,Z=14-20 even-even nuclei.

nsr-entry.authors: Ch.Lorenz, L.G.Sarmiento, D.Rudolph, P.Golubev, T.Eronen, D.A.Nesterenko, A.Kankainen, L.Canete, D.M.Cox, A.Fernandez, U.Forsberg, A.Jungclaus, I.Kojouharov, N.Kurz, N.Lalovic, J.Partanen, M.Reponen, S.Rinta-Antila, A.de Roubin, A.Saamark-Roth, V.Vaquero, M.Vilen
nsr-entry.title: |b decay of {+127}Cd and excited states in {+127}In
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+127},{+127m}Cd(|b{+-})[from {+238}U(p,F) followed by high-resolution mass separation in JYFL Penning trap]; measured |b, E|g, I|g, |b|g|g- and |g|g-coin, half-lives of {+127}Cd g.s. and isomer, isomeric ratios using double-sided-silicon-strip detectors and HPGe detectors of the TASISpec decay station at IGISOL, University of Jyvaskyla. {+127}In; deduced levels, J, |p, |b feedings, logft values, Gamow-Teller strength distributions, configurations. Comparison with large-scale shell model calculations, and with previous experimental results.

NUCLEAR STRUCTURE {+125},{+127},{+129}Cd,{+125},{+127},{+129}In; calculated levels, J, |p, sums of partitions of selected wave functions using large-scale shell-model with jj45 and NA-14 interactions, and compared with experimental data.

nsr-entry.authors: S.Lyons, A.Spyrou, S.N.Liddick, F.Naqvi, B.P.Crider, A.C.Dombos, D.L.Bleuel, B.A.Brown, A.Couture, L.Crespo Campo, J.Engel, M.Guttormsen, A.C.Larsen, R.Lewis, P.Moller, S.Mosby, M.R.Mumpower, E.M.Ney, A.Palmisano, G.Perdikakis, C.J.Prokop, T.Renstrom, S.Siem, M.K.Smith, S.J.Quinn
nsr-entry.title: {+69,71}Co |b-decay strength distributions from total absorption spectroscopy
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+69},{+71}Co(|b{+-})[from {+9}Be({+86}Kr,X),E=140 MeV/nucleon, followed by in flight separation of fragments by the A1900 fragment separator at NSCL-MSU]; measured E|g, I|g, E|b, |b|g-coin, half-lives of decays of {+69},{+71}Co decays, total absorption spectra using Summing NaI(Tl) (SuN) detector for |g rays and double-sided silicon strip detector (DSSD) for |b; deduced cumulative I|b distributions and compared to QRPA and Skyrme QRPA calculations, Gamow-Teller (GT) strength distribution. Comparison of decay half-lives with ENSDF values, and theoretical calculations using shell mode, QRPA and Skyrme QRPA. Relevance to r process in nucleosynthesis.

nsr-entry.authors: I.Miskun, for the Super-FRS Collaboration
nsr-entry.title: A novel method for the measurement of half-lives and decay branching ratios of exotic nuclei
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+119g}Sb,{+119m}Sb(IT); {+137}Sb(|b{+-})[|b-delayed neutrons]; {+212}Pb,{+216}Po, {+228}Th (|a); measured decay products, for {+137}Sb using of Cryogenic Stopping Cell (CSC) to achieve variable storage time; {+137}Sb calculated, simulated yields; deduced mass and charge distributions of Po and Pb isotopes, mass-to-charge ratio, T{-1/2}, branching ratios.

nsr-entry.authors: K.J.Moody, N.Gharibyan, P.M.Grant, D.A.Shaughnessy, J.D.Despotopulos, S.J.Tumey, T.A.Brown
nsr-entry.title: Decay of {+58}Co
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+58m}Co(IT),(EC)[from {+55}Mn(|a,n),E=27 MeV]; measured E|g, I|g, half-life of {+58m}Co decay. {+58}Fe; deduced levels, |e feeding to 2077 level, logft value, absolute intensity of 24.9-keV |g ray. Comparison with previous experimental and evaluated values. {+58m}Co(|b{+-}),(EC); discussed expected logft values and partial half-lives for decays to g.s. in {+58}Ni, and g.s., 811, 1675, 2077 and 2134 levels in {+58}Fe.
NUCLEAR REACTIONS {+55}Mn(|a,n){+58}Co/{+58m}Co,{+55}Mn(|a,2n){+57}Co,E=27 MeV; measured yields of reaction products.

nsr-entry.authors: H.Nishibata, S.Kanaya, T.Shimoda, A.Odahara, S.Morimoto, A.Yagi, H.Kanaoka, M.R.Pearson, C.D.P.Levy, M.Kimura, N.Tsunoda, T.Otsuka
nsr-entry.title: Structure of {+31}Mg: Shape coexistence revealed by |b-|y spectroscopy with spin-polarized {+31}Na
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+31}Na(|b{+-}),(|b{+-}n)[from {+238}U(p,X),E=500 MeV, followed by high-resolution mass separation and spin-polarization of {+31}Na beam at ISAC-I-TRIUMF facility]; measured |b spectra, polarization asymmetry of |b particles emitted by the decay of {+31}Na, E|b, I|b, E|g, I|g, |b|g(|q), |g(polarization), |b|g- and |g|g-coin, half-life of the 50-keV level in {+31}Mg by |b|g(t) using thin plastic scintillators for |b{+-} detection and Ge detectors for |g detection at TRIUMF. {+31}Mg; deduced levels, J, |p, %|b{+-}n and %|b{+-}2n, deformed rotational bands with K|p=1/2+ and 1/2-. {+31}Mg(|b{+-})[from {+31}Na |b{+-} decay]; observed |g rays. Comparison with previous experimental data, and with theoretical calculations. Systematics of energies of the lowest 1/2+, 3/2+, 3/2-, and 7/2- levels in {+31}Mg,{+33}Si,{+35}S,{+37}Ar,{+39}Ca.

NUCLEAR STRUCTURE {+31}Mg; calculated levels, J, |p using antisymmetrized molecular dynamics (AMD) plus generator coordinate method (GCM), and shell model with the EEdf1 interaction, microscopically derived from chiral effective field theory. Comparison with experimental data.
COMPILATION {+31}Mg; compiled and discussed experimental and evaluated data for levels, J, |p from 1984 to 2013.

nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+65}Fe(|b{+-})[from U(p,F),E=1.4 GeV followed by ionization using a Resonance Ionization Laser Ion Source (RILIS) at ISOLDE-CERN facility]; measured E|g, I|g, |b|g- and |g|g-coin, half-life of {+65}Fe g.s. from decay curves for |g rays, level half-lives by |b|g(t) and |b|g|g(t) using fast timing technique. {+65}Co; deduced levels, J, |p, |b feedings, logft, B(M1), and B(E2). Comparison with large-scale shell model calculations.
NUCLEAR STRUCTURE {+65}Co; calculated levels, J, |p, occupation numbers using shell-model with LNPS effective interaction. Comparison with experimental data.

nsr-entry.authors: M.Piersa, for the IDS Collaboration

nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+133},{+133m}In(|b{+-}),(|b{+-}n)[from U(n,F),E=fast followed by ionization using a Resonance Ionization Laser Ion Source (RILIS) and High-Resolution Separator (HRS)]; measured E|g, I|g, |b|g-coin, and half-lives of {+133}In and {+133}In isomer at ISOLDE-CERN facility. {+133}In,{+132},{+133}Sn; deduced levels, J, |p, |b feedings, logft, %|b{+-}n or P{-n}, configurations, neutron single particle states above N=82, |g emission from neutron-unbound states, competition between neutron and |g decay of levels above S(n), and doubly magic {+132}Sn region. Systematics of energies of 1/2+, 3/2+, 5/2+, 7/2+ and 11/2- states in {+125},{+127},{+129},{+131}Sn.{+132},{+133}Sn,{+132}Sb(|b{+-})[from {+133}In decay]; observed |g rays in {+132},{+133}Sb,{+132}Te.

nsr-entry.title: Detailed spectroscopy of {+46}Ca: A study of the |b{+-} decay of {+46}K
nsr-entry.keywords: RADIOACTIVITY {+46}K(|b{+-})[from U(p,X),E=500 MeV]; measured E|g, I|g, |g|g-coin, |g|g(|q), ce, |b particles using GRIFFIN array of 15 HPGe detectors for |g detection, PACES array of five Si(Li) detectors for conversion electrons, and SCEPTAR array of 10 plastic scintillators for |b-particle tagging, half-life of {+46}K decay at TRIUMF-ISAC facility. {+46}Ca; deduced levels, J, |p, |b feedings, logft, |g-branching ratios, multipole mixing ratios. Comparison of level structure with theoretical predictions from microscopic valence space Hamiltonians derived from NN+3N forces.
